title: mdk配置出现问题，急，在线等
author: Fish.E
txt_content:
RT
各种加速的办法都试过了，一点用都没有。折腾了一晚上，求解决方法。

replies.author: Fish.E
replies.txt_content:
显示E:\forge-1.7.10-10.13.4.1614-1.7.10-src>gradlew.bat setupDecompWorkspace
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not load wrapper properties from 'E:\forge-1.7.10-10.13.4.1614-1.7.10-src\gradle\wrapper\gradle-wrapper.properties'.

        at org.gradle.wrapper.WrapperExecutor.readDistroUrl(WrapperExecutor.java:82)

        ... 2 more

replies.author: 0x3B800001
replies.txt_content:
看错误报告是楼主自行修改了gradle\wrapper\gradle-wrapper.properties导致的
你可以尝试在该文件中加入一行
distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-2.0-bin.zip复制代码
再进行配置
